title: Examining Asteroid Orbits from a Different Perspective

previous.title: Looking at Asteroids Close to Earth

content:
Next, look at the orbits of Earth and the asteroid Bennu from all possible angles.

Note: You can now rotate the objects in the window by left-clicking and dragging. (In addition, you can still zoom in and out and change the location of the objects in the window).

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Do you think Bennu could hit Earth? Explain your reasoning.
